text.p: Results of International
Cricket Council (ICC) Trophy matches on Tuesday:
West Africa beat Israel by 190 runs
Scores:
West Africa 247-6 in 50 overs (innings closed); Israel 57
in 21.1 overs
Scotland beat Denmark by 45 runs
Scores:
Scotland 167-10 in 48 overs; Denmark 122 in 45.4 overs.
Ireland beat Netherlands on comparative scoring rate (game
called off due to rain with Ireland batting)
Scores:
Ireland 91-3 in 23 overs; Holland 193-8 innings closed
Bangladesh beat Hong Kong by seven wickets
Scores:
Hong Kong 145 in 45.2 overs; Bangladesh 148-3 in 38.2
overs;
Kenya beat Canada by 159 runs
Scores:
Kenya 302-6 innings closed; Canada 143-8 in 48 overs
Unsited Arab Emirates beat United States by 34 runs
Scores:
United Arab Emirates 189-8; United States 155 in 40.2
overs.
